mapper.select: SELECT w.JOURNAL_CODE, w.TITLE, w.WALK_DATE, w.JOURNAL_CONTENT, w.PATH, w.VIDEO, w.JOURNAL_PREPARATION_DATE, w.WALKER_CODE, w.PUPPY_CODE, p.DOG_NAME, p.DOG_BREED, p.AGE, p.GENDER, p.DOG_SIZE, p.WEIGHT, p.PERSONALITY, p.NEUTRALIZATION_PRE_ABS, p.DISEASE_PRE_ABS, p.NOTE, p.CLIENT_USER_ID, p.PICTURE FROM WALK_JOURNAL w LEFT JOIN PUPPY p ON w.PUPPY_CODE = p.PUPPY_CODE

SELECT w.JOURNAL_CODE, w.TITLE, w.WALK_DATE, w.JOURNAL_CONTENT, w.PATH, w.VIDEO, w.JOURNAL_PREPARATION_DATE, w.WALKER_CODE, w.PUPPY_CODE, p.DOG_NAME, p.DOG_BREED, p.AGE, p.GENDER, p.DOG_SIZE, p.WEIGHT, p.PERSONALITY, p.NEUTRALIZATION_PRE_ABS, p.DISEASE_PRE_ABS, p.NOTE, p.CLIENT_USER_ID, p.PICTURE, m.NAME, m.PHONE FROM WALK_JOURNAL w JOIN PUPPY p ON w.PUPPY_CODE = p.PUPPY_CODE JOIN MEMBER m ON w.WALKER_CODE = m.MEMBER_CODE WHERE w.JOURNAL_CODE = #{journalCode}

SELECT w.JOURNAL_CODE, w.TITLE, w.WALK_DATE, w.JOURNAL_CONTENT, w.PATH, w.VIDEO, w.JOURNAL_PREPARATION_DATE, w.WALKER_CODE, w.PUPPY_CODE, p.DOG_NAME, p.DOG_BREED, p.AGE, p.GENDER, p.DOG_SIZE, p.WEIGHT, p.PERSONALITY, p.NEUTRALIZATION_PRE_ABS, p.DISEASE_PRE_ABS, p.NOTE, p.CLIENT_USER_ID, p.PICTURE, m.NAME, m.PHONE FROM WALK_JOURNAL w JOIN PUPPY p ON w.PUPPY_CODE = p.PUPPY_CODE JOIN MEMBER m ON w.WALKER_CODE = m.MEMBER_CODE WHERE w.WALKER_CODE = #{walkerCode}

SELECT w.JOURNAL_CODE, w.TITLE, w.WALK_DATE, w.JOURNAL_CONTENT, w.PATH, w.VIDEO, w.JOURNAL_PREPARATION_DATE, w.WALKER_CODE, w.PUPPY_CODE, p.DOG_NAME, p.DOG_BREED, p.AGE, p.GENDER, p.DOG_SIZE, p.WEIGHT, p.PERSONALITY, p.NEUTRALIZATION_PRE_ABS, p.DISEASE_PRE_ABS, p.NOTE, p.CLIENT_USER_ID, p.PICTURE, m.NAME, m.PHONE FROM WALK_JOURNAL w JOIN PUPPY p ON w.PUPPY_CODE = p.PUPPY_CODE JOIN MEMBER m ON w.WALKER_CODE = m.MEMBER_CODE WHERE w.WALKER_CODE = #{walkerCode} AND w.JOURNAL_CODE = #{journalCode}
